channel.title: CVE Feed for HCL Software -- HCL Verse
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HCL Software -- HCL Verse

item.title: CVE-2023-37496|2024-09-27T21:58:22.836Z -- hcl%20software -- hcl%20verse
item.description: HCL Verse is susceptible to a Stored Cross Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability. An attacker could execute script in a victim's web browser to perform operations as the victim and/or steal the victim's cookies, session tokens, or other sensitive information.
